articles.content: INDIA’S DOMINANT run at the Under-19 World Cup culminated in a record-extending fifth title on Sunday. The latest triumph, however, will stand apart due to the tenacity shown in the face of unprecede… [+6658 chars]

articles.title: Jason Holder, the batter, sets the benchmark for West Indies - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: West Indies' No. 7 was at it again, trying to dig his team out of a hole - the way he often goes about it begs the question: does he deserve a promotion?

articles.title: Juan Martín del Potro likely to retire after Buenos Aires, Rio de Janeiro tournaments - ESPN India
articles.description: Juan Martín del Potro, who won the 2009 US Open, says he is likely to retire from professional tennis after playing tournaments in Buenos Aires this week and then in Rio de Janeiro.
